Package com.oopsipushedtomain

Class QRCode

java.lang.Object
com.oopsipushedtomain.QRCode
public class QRCode extends Object
Represents an QR code within the application. This class is used to model QR codes, including their details such as string and the UIDs linking them to their image and what they are linked to, start and end times.

Outstanding issues: - Need to implement a delete function to remove it from the database

  • Constructor Details

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(String text)
      Generates a new qr code for the given text. It will store it into the database
      Parameters:
      text - The text that is shown when scanning the qr code

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(String qrCodeID, QRCode.DataLoadedListener listener)
      Loads a previously created QR code from the database
      Parameters:
      qrCodeID - The UID of the QR code to load
      listener - A listener for checking when the data is done loading

  • Method Details

    • InitDatabase

      public void InitDatabase()
      Initializes the database parameters for accessing firestore

    • UpdateAllDataFields

      public void UpdateAllDataFields(QRCode.NewCodeListener listener)
      Updates all of the fields of the QRCode class from the database It will also move on to load the actual QR image
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to determine when data is received

    • loadQrCodeImage

      public void loadQrCodeImage(QRCode.OnBitmapReceivedListener listener)
      Loads a QR code image from Firebase Storage
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener for determining when the data transfer is done

      public void generateCode(String text) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a QR code from the given text
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If the QR code fails to write
